basics.name: Zhaodong Liu
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher
basics.summary: A Computer Science and Mathematics double major student at New York University Shanghai with research experience in generative retrieval, language models, and optimization.

courses: Introduction to Computer Science & Data Science (A)
highlights: Study-away Experience: NYU New York (Fall 2024, Spring 2025)

work.name: New York University Shanghai
work.summary: Conducted research on Generative Retrieval for Recommendation Systems under Prof. Hongyi Wen.
highlights: Developed models to predict user click sequences on Amazon dataset.
Designed and evaluated RQ-VAE and VQ-VAE architectures to capture discrete user behavior.
Applied BPE tokenization for improved sequence representation.
Adapted model architecture for multi-modal representation learning.

work.name: New York University
work.summary: Finetuned pretrained language models for retrosynthesis of chemical reactions under Prof. He He.
highlights: Developed prediction models using SMILES notation for chemical reactions.
Applied LLMs for dataset reconstruction, improving Top-1 Accuracy from 58.8% to 74.2%.
Implemented fine-tuning strategies (frozen layers, MLP adapters, LoRA) to optimize efficiency.

work.name: New York University Shanghai
work.summary: Worked on driving route optimization considering traffic light timings under Prof. Zhibin Chen.
highlights: Developed optimization system for traffic-aware route planning.
Implemented Dijkstra algorithm to compute shortest paths under real-world constraints.
Simulated real traffic signal data, demonstrating improvements in travel efficiency.

volunteer.organization: PEER-Pal Club, New York University Shanghai
volunteer.summary: Organized events and managed club financial operations.
highlights: Facilitated letter exchanges and Q&A sessions with high school students from Hunan Province.

volunteer.organization: Chamber Orchestra, New York University Shanghai
volunteer.summary: Led the trombone section and coordinated rehearsals and instrument logistics.
